#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>
#include <math.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    long long int a,b;
    scanf ("%lld %lld",&a,&b);
    while (a!=0&&b!=0)
    {
        int count=0,carry=0;
        while (a>0&&b>0)
        {
            carry=(carry+a%10+b%10)/10;
            a=a/10;
            b=b/10;
            if (carry>0)
                count++;
        }
        if (count==0)
            printf ("No carry operation.\n");
        else if (count==1)
            printf ("1 carry operation.\n");
        else printf ("%d carry operations.\n",count);
        scanf ("%lld %lld",&a,&b);
    }
	return 0;
}
